casebody.data:
Dorothy DAVIS
v.
THE MACON COUNTY BOARD OF EDUCATION. No. 476P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2006. S. Luke Largess, Charlotte, for Dorothy Davis. Shannon Spainhour, Charlotte, for Macon County Bd. of Ed. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 632 S.E.2d 590 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 6th day of September 2006 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th day of November 2006."
